evidence.claim: OncoAdvisor integrates with FHIR for healthcare data exchange.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for patient data security.
OncoAdvisor utilizes HL7 standards for interoperability.
OncoAdvisor's case studies detail collaborations involving EHR systems and patient management workflows.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant use case evidence found for X12 transactions or clearinghouse functions.
